import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from'react';import{createChart}from'lightweight-charts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StockChart=()=>{const chartRef=useRef(null);const chartContainerRef=useRef();const[symbol,setSymbol]=useState('');const[candlestickSeries,setCandlestickSeries]=useState(null);const fetchAndRenderChart=async ticker=>{try{const res=await fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/stock-data?symbol=${ticker}`);const json=await res.json();const data=json.data;if(!data||data.s!=='ok'){alert('Invalid symbol or no data found.');return;}const formattedData=data.t.map((time,i)=>({time:time,open:data.o[i],high:data.h[i],low:data.l[i],close:data.c[i]}));// Reset chart if already exists
if(chartRef.current){chartRef.current.remove();}const chart=createChart(chartContainerRef.current,{width:chartContainerRef.current.clientWidth,height:400});const series=chart.addCandlestickSeries();series.setData(formattedData);chartRef.current=chart;setCandlestickSeries(series);}catch(err){console.error('Failed to load chart:',err);alert('Error fetching data.');}};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const ticker=symbol.trim().toUpperCase();if(!ticker)return;fetchAndRenderChart(ticker);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Real-Time Stock Chart Viewer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter stock symbol (e.g., AAPL)",value:symbol,onChange:e=>setSymbol(e.target.value),style:{padding:'8px',fontSize:'16px',marginRight:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Load Chart"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:chartContainerRef,style:{marginTop:'20px',width:'100%',height:'400px'}})]});};export default StockChart;
